Articles.Content:
[![a4z71Ps.gif](http://i.imgur.com/a4z71Ps.gif)](http://imgur.com/a4z71Ps)

Addin was fine, he didn't fall off the cliff. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
TIL there's a nice flat mountain not far from KSC which I could utilize.
Good, Good. Now drop a para-rover out the back of an airplane. I dare you. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> 
> Good, Good. Now drop a para-rover out the back of an airplane. I dare you. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Aww, that sounds way too safe!
haha how did you get that thing up there in the first place?

> 
> Aww, that sounds way too safe!

Not if you do it with the new 1.0 aerodynamics. Also, no rockets, just parachutes. I still dare you.

> 
> haha how did you get that thing up there in the first place?

See the (half empty) fuel tanks and side rockets? I drove from KSP and launched from the base of the cliff, landing on a small plateau is tricky! 

> 
> Also, no rockets, just parachutes. I still dare you.

Hmm, I'll have to think about how to fit a large rover into a cargo bay... Parachutes only, I might pop the wheels on landing ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
